title: 84 52 7 "Tony Tony Chopper""Blue-nosed Reindeer! Chopper's Secret!"Transliteration: "Tonakai wa aoppana! Choppā no himitsu!" (Japanese:トナカイは青っ鼻!チョッパーの秘密) Daisuke Nishio Michiru Shimada October 21, 2001(2001-10-21)[12] October 1, 2005[13]
